receive.doc: Polls Slack and sends you any new messages that appear in public channels of your Slack team.
receive.confirmation: you receive a message on slack
receive.label: you receive a message

args.name: channel
args.question: What channel do you want to send the message to?

args.name: message
args.question: What message do you want me to send?

send.doc: Send a message to the specified Slack channel as a bot named after you. Omit the hashtag from the channel name.
send.confirmation: send a message on slack to $channel saying $message
examples: send a message on slack to $channel saying $message
send.label: send a message

args.name: channel
args.question: What channel do you want to change?

args.name: purpose
args.question: What purpose do you want to set?

updateChannelPurpose.doc: Update the specified channel's purpose. Omit the hashtag from the channel name.
updateChannelPurpose.confirmation: update the purpose of slack channel $channel to $purpose
examples: set the channel purpose for $channel to $purpose on slack
updateChannelPurpose.label: update the channel's purpose

args.name: channel
args.question: What channel do you want to change?

args.name: topic
args.question: What should be the new topic?

updateChannelTopic.doc: Update the specified channel's topic. Omit the hashtag from the channel name.
updateChannelTopic.confirmation: update the topic of slack channel $channel to $topic
examples: set the channel topic for $channel to $topic on slack
updateChannelTopic.label: update the channel's topic

args.name: presence
args.question: What should be your new presence?

setPresence.doc: Update your displayed presence. Presence must be 'away' or 'auto'.
examples: set my presence as $presence on slack
setPresence.label: set your presence
